title: Q&A ////// 109
description:
Q&A ////// 109

TrueCrimeGarage.com

You want answers? Do you think you're entitled to answers? Well we've got answers. You want the truth? Well maybe you can't handle the truth. The True Crime Garage Army has asked and shall wait no longer. After many requests to do a Q&A show we have decided to invite everyone into the garage for a round of beers. Join us as we answer your questions.

Beer of the Week - Black as your soul - ghost 525 by Adroit Theory Garage grade - 5 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
